page.title: 20 A summary of the area
page.content: There are about 550 people living in Otley.There are about 200 houses of which about 40-45 are council houses. Although this is an agricultural area the number of people actually working on the land is fairly small.Most local people find employment either in Ipswich or in Woodbridge or in Felixstow.This means that transport is especially important.Rural bus services tend to be rather limited. In the course of this survey I have received help from the children in the school who have investigated the farming.In addition Mr Mosesson at Otley Hall has supplied information. Finally I would like to record my thanks to all of the local people for their comments. Mr.Peter Coleby(Otley Primary School)
